t: Psalm 145
Great Is the Lord
A Song of Praise. Of David.
I*pn will extol you, my God and King, and*ld bless your name forever and ever.
Every*ln day I will bless you and*ld praise your name forever and ever.
Great*ln is the Lord,*s and greatly to be praised, and*ld his greatness is unsearchable.
One*pn generation shall commend your works to another, and*ld shall declare your mighty acts.
On*ln the glorious splendor of your majesty, and*ld on your wondrous works, I will meditate.
They*ln shall speak of the might of your awesome deeds, and*ld I will declare your greatness.
They*ln shall pour forth the fame of your abundant goodness and*ld shall sing aloud of your righteousness.
The*pn Lord*s is gracious and merciful, slow*ld to anger and abounding in steadfast love.
The*ln Lord*s is good to all, and*ld his mercy is over all that he has made.
All*pn your works shall give thanks to you, O Lord,*s and*ld all your saints shall bless you!
They*ln shall speak of the glory of your kingdom and*ld tell of your power,
to*ln make known to the children of man your mighty deeds, and*ld the glorious splendor of your kingdom.
Your*ln kingdom is an everlasting kingdom, and*ld your dominion endures throughout all generations. [The*pn Lord*s is faithful in all his words and*ld kind in all his works.]
The*ln Lord*s upholds all who are falling and*ld raises up all who are bowed down.
The*ln eyes of all look to you, and*ld you give them their food in due season.
You*ln open your hand; you*ld satisfy the desire of every living thing.
The*ln Lord*s is righteous in all his ways and*ld kind in all his works.
The*ln Lord*s is near to all who call on him, to*ld all who call on him in truth.
He*ln fulfills the desire of those who fear him; he*ld also hears their cry and saves them.
The*ln Lord*s preserves all who love him, but*ld all the wicked he will destroy.
My*pn mouth will speak the praise of the Lord,*s and*ld let all flesh bless his holy name forever and ever.
